mapper.update:
update damage_repository_position
damage_repository_position.bridge_tunnel = #{bridgeTunnel},
damage_repository_position.create_time = #{createTime},
damage_repository_position.damage_position = #{damagePosition},
damage_repository_position.direction = #{direction},
damage_repository_position.hole_position = #{holePosition},
damage_repository_position.line_category = #{lineCategory},
damage_repository_position.line_id = #{lineId},
damage_repository_position.line_name = #{lineName},
damage_repository_position.miles = #{miles},
damage_repository_position.station_id = #{stationId},
damage_repository_position.stock_exchange = #{stockExchange},
damage_repository_position.thigh_track_id = #{thighTrackId},
damage_repository_position.update_time = #{updateTime}
where damage_repository_position.order_detail_id = #{orderDetailId}
mapper.select: select damage_repository_position.bridge_tunnel, damage_repository_position.create_time, damage_repository_position.damage_position, damage_repository_position.direction, damage_repository_position.hole_position, damage_repository_position.line_category, damage_repository_position.line_id, damage_repository_position.line_name, damage_repository_position.miles, damage_repository_position.order_detail_id, damage_repository_position.station_id, damage_repository_position.stock_exchange, damage_repository_position.thigh_track_id, damage_repository_position.update_time form damage_repository_position where damage_repository_position.order_detail_id = #{orderDetailId}
